Class Animator

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • SuperSmoothMover
        • Animator
  • public abstract class Animator
extends SuperSmoothMover
    An animation system integrating Mr.Cohens Animation and AnimationManager classes Animator acts as a superclass which handles any and all animations
    Version:
    (a version number or a date)
    Author:
    (Lu-Wai)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act()
      The act method of animator plays the animations when the boolean playing is true
      It loops all the frames of the animation
      void addAnimation​(Animation anim)
      Takes an Animation object and adds it into the current animations
      void flipAnimation​(java.lang.String name)
      Takes a string for the name of the animation
      If an animation with a matching name is found, the animations will have all its frames flipped.
      void playAnimation​(int index)
      Takes a int for the index of the animation
      If an animation at that index is found, that animation is set to play
      void playAnimation​(java.lang.String name)
      Takes a string for the name of the animation
      If an animation with a matching name is found, that animation is set to play
      void setAnimations​(Animation[] anim)
      Sets the list of all the animations

      • flipAnimation

        public void flipAnimation​(java.lang.String name)
        Takes a string for the name of the animation
        If an animation with a matching name is found, the animations will have all its frames flipped.
        Used to flip animations for Left, Right versions
